This agreement is not a concession but a supply agreement. they do not have a physical shop in Level but will only supply goods to us. I am not sure this type of insurance is needed especially if it is coming from a need from Dubai Mall

Can you please confirm? Happy to discuss on a call if needed

 

Best regards

Comments are included as well in the attached.

Hagop
